modernize-regression-tests.title: Implement General Test Logic Regressions
modernize-regression-tests.instruction_raw: Resolve judicial and manufacturing test regressions by aligning with current logic and SSoT.

liquidate-final-residue.title: Liquidate 6 Residual Test Failures
liquidate-final-residue.instruction_raw: Apply final fixes for BailoutCovenant, SalesRules precision, and DoubleEntry transaction deltas based on the AUDIT report.
